TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Span`1/Enumerator<T> extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 为 的元素提供枚举器。

span.span: Provides an enumerator for the elements of a .

remarks.format: 语言的[foreach](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/foreach-in)和 For Each ... C# C# [For Each...Next](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/for-each-next-statement)Visual Basic 中的下一个构造隐藏了枚举器的复杂性。The C# [foreach](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/foreach-in) of the C# language and the [For Each...Next](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/for-each-next-statement) construct in Visual Basic hides the complexity of enumerators. 建议使用 `foreach` 或 `For Each...Next`，而不是直接操作枚举器。Instead of directly manipulating the enumerator, using `foreach` or `For Each...Next` is recommended. 最初，枚举器定位在 中第一个元素之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the . 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 在读取 的值之前，必须调用 以将枚举数前移到 中的第一项。You must call to advance the enumerator to the first item in the before reading the value of . 在调用 之前返回相同的值。 returns the same value until is called. 将 设置到 中的下一项。 sets to the next item in the . 如果 越过 的末尾， 将返回 `false`。If passes the end of the , returns `false`. 当枚举器处于此状态时，对 的后续调用也将返回 `false` 并且 未定义。When the enumerator is at this state, subsequent calls to also return `false` and is undefined. 不能再次将 设置到 中的第一项;必须改为创建新的枚举器实例。You cannot set to the first item in the again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 枚举器没有对 的独占访问权限。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the . 此外，还可以修改范围所基于的基础数据。In addition, the underlying data on which the span is based can also be modified. 因此，在范围内进行枚举本质上并不是一个线程安全的过程。Therefore, enumerating through a span is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要保证枚举过程中的线程安全，必须实现自己的同步。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you must implement your own synchronization. 例如，下面的代码具有争用条件。For example, the following code has a race condition. 这并不能确保在 `ClearContents` 方法执行之前枚举跨距。It does not ensure that the span will be enumerated before the `ClearContents` method executes. 因此，在枚举范围期间将清除基础数组：As a result, the underlying array is cleared during enumeration of the span: [!code-csharp[System.Span.Enumerator-no-synchronization](~/samples/snippets/csharp/api/system/span.enumerator/nosync/Program.cs)] 如果在枚举范围之前同步对数组的访问，则在下面的示例中，由于 `EnumerateSpan` 方法的修改后的版本，`ClearContents` 方法不会修改枚举过程中的基础范围数据。If you synchronize access to the array before enumerating the span, as the revised version of the `EnumerateSpan` method does in the following example, the `ClearContents` method doesn't modify underlying span data during enumeration. 请注意，该示例将锁定范围所基于的基础数组。Note that the example locks the underlying array on which the span is based. [!code-csharp[System.Span.Enumerator-no-synchronization](~/samples/snippets/csharp/api/system/span.enumerator/sync/Program.cs#1)] 不同于 .NET 中的其他枚举器结构，：Unlike some other enumerator structures in .NET, the : - 不实现 或 接口。Does not implement the or interface. 这是因为 是[ref 结构](/dotnet/csharp/reference-semantics-with-value-types#ref-struct-type)。This is because is a [ref struct](/dotnet/csharp/reference-semantics-with-value-types#ref-struct-type). - 不包含 `Reset` 方法，该方法可将枚举数设置为其在范围中第一个元素之前的初始位置。Does not include a `Reset` method, which can set the enumerator to its initial position before the first element in the span. （ 方法必须作为接口的一部分来实现，但大多数实现者会引发异常或不提供实现。）(The method must be implemented as part of the interface, but most implementors either throw an exception or provide no implementation.)

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Current As T
public: property T % Current { T % get(); };

summary.span: 获取对枚举器当前位置的项目的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the item at the current position of the enumerator.

value.span: 中位于该枚举数当前位置的元素。

span.span: The element in the at the current position of the enumerator.

remarks.format: 在下列任一情况下，不定义 `Current`：`Current` is undefined under either of the following conditions: - 在创建枚举器后，该枚举器将置于范围中第一个元素之前。Immediately after the enumerator is created, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the span. 在读取 `Current`的值之前，必须调用 以将枚举数前移到跨距的第一个元素。 must be called to advance the enumerator to the first element of the span before reading the value of `Current`. - 对 的最后一次调用返回了 `false`，指示范围的结束。The last call to returned `false`, which indicates the end of the span. `Current` 在调用 之前返回相同的值。`Current` returns the same value until is called. 将 `Current` 设置为范围中的下一项。 sets `Current` to the next item in the span.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool MoveNext() cil managed

summary.span: 将枚举器推进到 的下一项。

span.span: Advances the enumerator to the next item of the .

returns.span: 如果枚举器成功推进到下一项，则为 ；如果已通过范围的末尾，则为 。

span.span: if the enumerator successfully advanced to the next item; if the end of the span has been passed.

remarks.format: 创建枚举器后，该枚举数将定位在范围中的第一个元素之前，对的第一次调用 `MoveNext` 将枚举数前移到该范围中的第一项。After an enumerator is created, it is positioned before the first element in the span, and the first call to `MoveNext` advances the enumerator to the first item in the span. 如果 `MoveNext` 通过跨度的末尾，则 `MoveNext` 返回 `false`。If `MoveNext` passes the end of the span, `MoveNext` returns `false`. 当枚举器处于此状态时，对 `MoveNext` 的后续调用也将返回 `false`。When the enumerator is at this state, subsequent calls to `MoveNext` also return `false`.
